description:
Implementation of queue for items, using dynamic collections.

Entries in the queue must be structured items - that is, either JSON Objects or Arrays, or XML Nodes.

functions.name: back
functions.description: Return the last item in the queue (the last added), without removing it.
functions.summary: Return the last item in the queue (the last added), without removing it.

returns.description: the last item, or empty sequence if queue is empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: copy
functions.signature: ($destName as xs:QName, $sourceName as xs:QName) as empty-sequence()
functions.description:
Copy all items from source queue to a destination queue.

If destination queue does not exist, it is created first.

If destination queue is not empty, the items are appended last.
functions.summary: Copy all items from source queue to a destination queue.

parameters.name: destName
parameters.description: name of the destination queue.

parameters.name: sourceName
parameters.description: name of the source queue.

functions.name: create
functions.description: Create a queue with the name given. If a queue with the given name already exists, an error is raised.
functions.summary: Create a queue with the name given.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: name of the new queue.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:EXISTS if the queue identified by $name already exists.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: empty
functions.description: Checks if a queue exists and is empty.
functions.summary: Checks if a queue exists and is empty.

returns.description: true is the queue is empty, false if it is not empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: front
functions.description: Return the first item in the queue (the first added), without removing it.
functions.summary: Return the first item in the queue (the first added), without removing it.

returns.description: the first item, or empty sequence if queue is empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: pop
functions.description: Return the first item in the queue, and remove it.
functions.summary: Return the first item in the queue, and remove it.

returns.description: the first item, or empty sequence if queue is empty.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: push
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $value as structured-item()) as empty-sequence()
functions.description: Add a new item to the queue; the queue will contain a copy of the given item.
functions.summary: Add a new item to the queue; the queue will contain a copy of the given item.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: the item to be added.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: size
functions.description: Count of items in the queue.
functions.summary: Count of items in the queue.
errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">queue:NOT-EXISTS if the queue identified by $name does not exist.</xqdoc:error>
